title: Anansi and The Magic Pot
description: Anansi the Spider man is up to his tricks again. The rains haven't come, and there's not enough to eat, but Anansi finds a magic food pot. Do you think he shares what he's found? Listen to Tuup's funny retelling of this trickster tale from the Caribbean and see if Anansi has learned how to share.
itunes:title: Anansi and The Magic Pot
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
